title: Flower Crowns and Fearsome Things
description: in her new standalone poetry collection, flower crowns & fearsome things , bestselling & award-winning poetess amanda lovelace explores the complexity of femininity through alternating wildflower & wildfire poems.within these pages, you will find that each of us has the ability to be both soft & fierce at the same time. there is no need to choose one or the other.
author: Amanda Lovelace
